entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
